title: Rule: The Unspoken Love - Novel Updates
genre: Drama   Josei   Romance   Slice of Life
tags: Affair   Arrogant Characters   Average-looking Protagonist   Betrayal   Bickering Couple   Cautious Protagonist   Clumsy Love Interests   Comedic Undertone   Conflicting Loyalties   Early Romance   Fated Lovers   Misunderstandings   Multiple POV   Past Plays a Big Role   Short Story

description:
Some people want to find their lost memories.
Some just want to forget it all.

But what if two people come together, one who wants to forget while the other wants to remember?

Is it possible for the two of them to find the answers that theyâ€™ve been waiting for so long to find, from each other?
Will the other person forget while you start to remember?>
